## LogLevelObj variable

Log level mapping object. Defines the severity levels for logging with corresponding numeric values. - debug: 7 (lowest severity) - info: 6 - warning: 4 - error: 3 (highest severity)

**Signature:**

```typescript
LogLevelObj: Record<LogLevelType, number>
```
